change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescript manuscript with holograph corrections and edits of the juvenile novel, Stirrup High. The autobiographical story is about Walt, who as a fourteen year old boy, spends the summer as a working cowboy on his father's Montana ranch.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Stirrup High (MS 032). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by chapter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript manuscript with holograph corrections and edits of the juvenile novel, Stirrup High. The autobiographical story is about Walt, who as a fourteen year old boy, spends the summer as a working cowboy on his father's Montana ranch.

relatedmaterial.p: More material available in AZ 424, Box 22, which contains Coburn's correspondence regarding Stirrup High.
Published by Julian Messner, Inc., New York, 1957.
